channel.title: Mobility, Energy, and New Infrastructure - Terry Chen
channel.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

item.title: Understanding Xiaomi: IP Risk & Starting Again
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Understanding Xiaomi's evolution from smartphone maker to comprehensive technology ecosystem, with focus on electric vehicle ambitions and IoT infrastructure. Investment analysis of Xiaomi's diversification strategy.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen
